venue.name: Not exactly this address, but close to it

item.description:
This is very short notice, so RSVP and register ASAP!

Sign up instructions are in the link below.  Email or call to get yourself signed up.  Because of the short notice, (sorry, I only learned about this Sunday night) the need to register with the tour group in advance, and the cost, I am putting individual responsibility to sign up.

$20 a person

http://www.wrwc.org/documents/Canoe_Trip_Flyer_2012.pdf

 

My number is 703-314-3380 if you have any questions.  The weather looks decent, we will keep our fingers crossed.
item.how_to_find_us: At the landing - there is a gazebo across from the parking lot
item.name: Canoe trip in downtown Providence
